resources.string: How to choose the optimal number of words?\n\n The average speed of reading in Russian for an adult is between 120-180 words per minute. according to experimental studies, the average speed is equal to 201 words per minute (with a spread of values from 60 to 378), with an average percentage of assimilation of 52
You can read your books at high speed we need to get their list from the local storage, so we need access to the local storage
